name: Rainy Day (marumelon)
description:
Rainy Day is a 2d hand drawn game about being indoors on a rainy day. Stay cozy while enjoying your hobbies. Relax and become immersed with the cozy room's rain and lo-fi music. 

Press spacebar to start the game. Use the arrow keys to move through scenes and enter to choose between different options. There is a secret in this game can you find it?
